product_overview: A personal online portfolio showcasing the artistic and design works of Yoonhyeok Kim with rich interactive elements, responsive layouts, and optimized media presentation.
core_goals: Provide a visually impactful and easily navigable portfolio experience across all devices and browsers.
Ensure seamless and intuitive access to project details with responsive image and video galleries.
Maintain consistent and faithful typography and visual branding, particularly with Korean and custom fonts.
Guarantee robust functionality including navigation, media playback, and page transitions without errors.
key_features: Project List page featuring a responsive, hover-interactive grid of projects with distinct handling for video and image thumbnails.
Project Detail pages with a split-screen layout on desktop and swipe-enabled sliders on mobile/tablet, supporting high-resolution images and autoplaying videos.
Global Header navigation with links to Home, Works, About, and Brief pages, including active state highlighting and a clickable logo returning to Home.
About page with a hanging indent resume list, proper typography capitalization, and responsive column stacking on mobile.
Custom SVG cursors for enhanced interactivity that correctly adapt on touch devices.
Use of Next.js, React, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, and Swiper.js to optimize user experience and performance.
user_flow_summary: Users start at the Home page where the featured entrance image is prominently displayed with appropriate scaling and shadowing across devices.
From the Home page, users can navigate via the header to the Works page which displays a grid of projects adapting column count based on device viewport size.
Hovering or tapping project thumbnails reveals visual feedback; selecting a project navigates to that project's detail page.
On the Project Detail page, users can view a slider of images and/or videos with navigation clicks/swipes device-specific behaviors.
Users navigate back to the Works page with scroll restoration preserving their previous scroll position.
From any page, users may access the About page presenting the artistâ€™s biography and resume in a typographically refined layout.
validation_criteria: Fonts render correctly without flickering or inappropriate weighting across all supported browsers, especially Safari.
Custom SVG cursor visibility and behavior meet expectations on pointer and touch devices.
The Works page grid columns and thumbnail hover effects meet specified counts and opacity on all devices.
Video thumbnails maintain correct aspect ratio and playback on iOS Low Power Mode without black bars or cropping.
Project Detail pages enable slide navigation as specified for desktop and mobile/tablet, with autoplaying high-res media that respects layout constraints.
Page transitions execute smoothly with no visual or console errors including hydration mismatches or 404s.
Responsive layout and typography on the About page conform to hanging indent and capitalization standards.
Known regressions such as matching TD & Academic thumbnail sizes, and mobile footer positioning on Home are verified and addressed.
